column4: is there a way to access shared windows folders in a local network? as i understand it samba is for samba shares only? i guess with samba on the windows coputer aswell?
with Samba you can access folders shared from Windows machines and vice versa
well i didnt i didnt set any usernames or passwords usually i just join the local group on windows to access those
I've never used samba but it's supposed to work
